verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are God in heaven And here am I on earth So I’ll let my words be few Jesus, I am so in love with You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And I’ll stand in awe of You, Jesus Yes, I’ll stand in awe of You And I’ll let my words be few Jesus, I am so in love with You{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The simplest of all love songs I want to bring to You So I’ll let my words be few Jesus, I am so in love with You{/lang-eng}
